entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
